bibl.note: This is a very brief letter from governor John Sevier of Tennessee to the Sheriff of Knox County, Robert Houston. In the letter, the governor asks the sheriff to inquire about the planning of a prison break by some unnamed prisoners.

div.p: I am Doubtfull Doubtful the prisoners is preparing to make their escape
I am told they were heard at work last night appearingly appearing filing their Irons off
I beg you to come over and examine them, and take the most affectual effectual means in your power to keep them secure in prison
